Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Good printer, when it will work
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Compact Design
Cons: Unreliable; Jams Easily
I purchased this unit because I needed a printer with a scanner. I selected this unit because of the good service I have had out of other HP printers in the past. I will admit that setup is easy if you follow the directions in the quick start guide. Unfortunately the performance of the printer was less than spectacular. Every time I would try to print the paper would either jam or not feed at all, so that was a deal breaker, and I have since exchanged it for a different machine. I will admit that when it did print, the quality was what I have come to expect from HP printers.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Small size! Surprisingly it is not a very tall printer at all. Depth is not bad either. Wasn't too bad to setup overall. Says it prints at 8ppm, but I can say that may be at normal print quality. In draft mode, it really spits out the pages. Quality is not bad at all in draft either, so for generic/everyday printing that will do fine, and save you ink. Cartridges are decently sized (4 total) and they have XL versions available.
O.M.G. It comes with a USB Cable!!!!!! lol
Decent copying, fax works, has sheet feed for both fax and copy modes.
Cons: No hardware LAN. Wireless LAN requires use of a USB cable to initially configure and setup the wireless connectivity. You are not able to connect to a wireless network from the control panel via a search and ... connect as you would expect. Despite that small annoyance, the setup wasn't that bad. The CD walked you right through it. It connects to the printer via its unique id, rather than an IP address, which is good. Most newer printers do that, so no worries about different IP changes mucking it up later.
Small input tray. Holds maybe 25 or so pages at a time. Did print on 80lb paper, but I wouldn't recommend using a lot of that size on a printer of this level. The output tray is right above the in tray, and both don't leave a lot of room to work with paper, etc. You have to flip out panels to catch outgoing paper, and flip them back to make it easier to install blank paper.
Faxing either sent or received, generates reports. I disabled this manually so it didn't waste ink or paper every time I receive or send a fax.
Cartridges took approximately 5 minutes or so to prime during setup. It prints off a page which you then have to lay on the scanner to have it check the alignment.
For its use, this is perfect. Works fine, setup overall was fine and everyone is happy with it. Worth 5 stars in my opinion, and I have setup a LOT of HP printers over the years. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Cons: Nothing yet.
I returned a Cannon printer of the same size and price - it would not operate with my Dell laptop - it kept freezing up my computer. I paid $10 or so more for the HP, and I LOVE it. It was quick and easy to set up, goes to sleep to save energy but pops up the second I want to print something. Also, scanning, fax and copy all have their own button, so it is as simple to operate as it can be. The ink is less expensive too. Believe me, right now, this is the ONE!

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: works pretty well, but has some down sides
Item.Review:
Pros: good quality of both documents and pictures
Cons: very noisy, sometimes it takes multiple sheets of paper at once and jams
I've used this printer for quite a few documents and some pictures too (on matte paper). Both turn out pretty good- not blurry and good color matching for pictures. Problems though: the thing is Really loud sometimes. It makes bad sounding grinding sounds out of nowhere, and when it gets ready to print something you can hear stuff grinding and spinning very loudly. Not good for trying to print at night while people are sleeping! Also, something isn't right with how it takes the paper in- if the tray is too low I will jam really badly to the point where the paper is a wadded up ball in the back of the printer (its easy to take out at least). If yo ... u fill the tray to where its full enough to not jam, it will often take 2-4 sheets of paper instead of just one at a time. Harmless, but kind of annoying. Now more good stuff: Scanning is awesome. This is my first scan-capable device and I love it. Color or black and white- both are great. It also came with a good computer program to do stuff with the scanned images. Copying also works pretty great that I've seen, besides the printing which has the same problems as I mentioned above. All in all for about $100 this is a pretty darn good scan/printer/copier (I haven't used the fax part so don't know how well that works). It's nothing spectacular, but its a good first printer for a college student! I almost forgot! The wireless printing is really helpful and easy to use! But it also comes with a cable that works just as well. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use
Cons: Hard Setup; Jams Easily; Slow Print Time
Scanning- Scans are not as crisp as the photo quality. Changing the photo resolution did not help even when trying to crop items. It would be nice if the scanner automatically #'d the photos that you put in the same folder. It would save a step. I also got frustrated because the quality of the scans seemed to deteriorate over time. I was using it for an hour and that seemed to be too much. At times, some of my images didn't fully scan, only partially, causing me to rescan it a second time. On all instances, the second scan included the entire image. I decided to try to scan in some old documents through the top feeder- perhaps 10 sheets of paper. The noise coming from the machine was so terrible, I tho ... ught I'd broken it. It did scan but took a full 10 minutes for those 10 pages. This also confirmed that the scan quality is poor because the black ink showed up a medium grayish color. At this point, I've owned the printer for 2 days. Today, I tried to scan something and repeatedly got reports that the scanner was unreachable. I have no idea why this occurred. The error message said that I might need to update my IP address with the printer. I am just an average user. This is too complicated for me. I clicked on the HP update icon to see if that helped. It did not. I downloaded the print/ scan doctor, which helped me fix the problem. Printing- makes a god-awful crunching sound when a job prints. Very loud/ noisy. I sent an email from my computer and it jammed. I cleared the jam and the printer did not remember the job so I had to resend it. This has happened more than once and I have only printed a total of 10 pages so far. Set up- I'm sure this is easy for most people but it took me forever. I kept getting an error code- "forbidden 403"- when I tried to create an online account with eprintcenter.com. It took a long time to trouble shoot the solution to this problem and I had to spend an hour hunting down the solution in their community center. If this happens to you- the solution was very simple. I could not create an account for some reason using Firefox. When I opened Internet Explorer, it was smooth sailing to set up my account.
I'm keeping it, but just because I'm too lazy to return it. I wouldn't recommend it. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This printer looks good; however, the print output is small and hard to read. Vital keys, especially the fax keys, on the front panel do not light up (making it hard to see what you are pushing). The driver was hard as Hades to find (even on the HP web site) and the wireless option was difficult to find and link. This thing takes FOUR ink cartridges!! A 3-colored ink combo package is available (but not in XL size), but it would have been better if the black were included. The ink is not all that cheap either. HP could do much better in that area! The beauty is that it is a fax, printer, copier, and scanner. The biggest drawback in multifunction equipment like this is that if one part goes out and needs to go to the shop, you lose all the others too! Overall, I liked the product but not the ... hassle it took to get the proper driver and link the wireless option...and I have a great deal of computer experience and tons of patience. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Great Print Quality; Quiet; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Easy WiFi; Network Scan
The best part was the 100% automatic WiFi setup. Since we use WEP/WIA security key in our environment, I wasn't sure how that could possibly be automatically setup. HP works some kind of magic, and everything was setup in a couple of minutes. I didn't have to do anything. I NEVER had to plug in a cable! And boom, I'm printing and scanning over WiFi ... just like that! Amazing!
What's made my life so much easier has been the flawless operation of network scanning. I could not get network scan to work reliably on previous MFPs (non-HP), so I always had to use the USB cable for scanning.
With OfficeJet 4620, network scanning is a breeze. This allows the ... unit to be placed anywhere.
I also really like the ability to create custom "shortcuts". In each shortcut, you can select (flatbed or ADF), paper size, output format (PDF, JPEG), mode (color/gray/b&w), settings (contrast/brightness), specify destination folder (including email attachment). You can create as many "shortcuts" as you wish, even one for each destination folder. So nice!
I am not just completely satisfied with the OfficeJet 4620, but I was truly amazed with the WiFi setup, and very happy with the reliable/flexible scanning.
Of course, print/copy/fax work flawlessly. expand » « collapse

This was so easy to set up. I find it to be noisy as it reloads the pieces of paper. I am happy with the quality of the print outs.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Cons: Hard To Use; Difficult To Set Up
After 2 weeks I still can't get this thing to work. Setting it up with USB cable didn't work, only wireless. Now it won't print from the internet without an IP address. Can't get an IP address from the [*]! thing. And the FAX set up? All I managed to do was foul up my phones. I have a PH.D. but I think you need one in IT to make this thing work.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: So far so good with the 4620. Nice print from nearly any decice, easy setup, and access to many settings via a dedicated webpage just for the printer. Two things, however: You may need to run the printer alignment test a couple of times. The first time is done as part of the setup process, but if you need to do it again, go through the printer webpage. Printer alignment cannot be accessed via the normal toolbox, only through your printer's dedicated webpage. Second, and a minor gripe, is that the page printout tray gets in the way of the paper tray itself. If you want to load a photo, say a 4x6 or 5x7, you'll have to take the printout holder completely off and then reinstall it. Not hard, just a tad annoying. I've had some VERY bad luck with HP printers in the last few years, so I am hopin ... g this one turns out to be the charm. So far, so good. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use
Cons: Slow to fax or print page; Slow
Replaced my HP 2400 series printer with this one. My old printer was faster on printing and faxing than this one.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Efficient; Quality Construction; Easy to Use
The only thing I dislike about the printer is the locaton of the paper storage tray. It is underneath the paper output tray. This makes it a little difficult to access the paper storage tray without removing the paper output tray in order to print an envelope or 2 sided copies.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: The color is not even. There are white lines running through the solid color sections of the printing. Not a quality item. Maybe good for basic printing of articles, recipes online for home use. Not or business or quality printing.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This product is not easy to operate. It doesn't feed easily for copying. The tray for copies has to be removed in order to access the paper tray. In order to print envelopes you have to remove the paper because the feeder is in the middle. It is cumbersome. I've had to raise it off of my desk because I forget to replace the copy/print/feeder tray because that is the only way to access the paper tray in order to put checks in or some other paper. I don't know why the feed does not work. So I have to lift the lid to put in whatever I'm copying and there's no specific handle for this.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I purchased the HP 4622 today so I could scan and email work documents. I have 35 pages to scan in and it is taking a very long time, at an hour and still not done. I am very disappointed and will most likely return the printer. If you need to use this for multi page scanning, I would not recommend this product. Pros: The e-print works well and was very easy to set up.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Very easy to set-up though the print cartridges took a while to figure out how they went into the holder. Works perfectly and my first scan, my first FAX and my first print job went fine. I still have to figure out how to insert envelopes and cards. This product replaced my old HP scanner and a deskjet 940c printer (my reliable workhorse for many years).

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: This system cannot fax via Comcast phone
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use
Cons: Difficult To Set Up
HP promoted 4 in one capability - Wireless. Cannot fax via Cable providers bundled service. HP has lost a customer after buying multiple printers and most recent desktop PC from them.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Cons: Unreliable; Flimsy Construction; Difficult To Set Up; Inefficient
I was sorely disappointed with this product. My previous All in One HP printer lasted 9 years! It was used heavily, every day of the week. It was a fantastic printer. Because of my success with the last printer, without hesitation I purchased another one. This one appeared to be comparable to what I had enjoyed for so long, so it was an easy decision. However, the set up took forever, the quality of the printing is very poor, it's temperamental, slow and makes far too many noises, beeps etc, informing me of silly things, I don't care to know. Unfortunately, I will be returning this product.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Efficient; Reliable
We had a different brand name printer that was really cheap but the ink replacement was very expensive. We purchased this HP because the ink replacement was inexpensive. The printer itself is a great item. It works well, quickly and best of all, the ink cartridges can be relaced individually as needed at a low price. We are very happy.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: it is a really good one for home use !
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Was little difficult to set up E print mobil, but had to have help to get it right works good after getting it set up properly. paper extender is very flimsy and has to be handled with care.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: This product is worth the 99.00 I paid
Item.Review: The printer is a little difficult to set up. The directions are worthless . And the auto Fax Copier feed does not work. But for a cheap printer it does a nice job. The cartridges are also cheap. You get what you pay for..I was looking for an inexpensive printer, and this fits the bill.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Intuitive to use and quick setup.
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Efficient; Nice features
This was a gift for a non-tech person. I have no worries that this will be easy for them to use. Nice features and intuitive display menus.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Easy to Use
Cons: See below
Had to replace one of the color cartridges as the one with the printer did not print. Prefer a 3in1 color cartridge rather than 3 separate ones.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I have been a long time loyal customer of HP printers for many, many years, that has now changed. I purchased the 4620 on 5/8. Attempted to setup printer, after 4 hours consisting of on line help, new drivers, talking with a real person at HP, I ended up with a Scanner Failure, could not scan or copy. Took this printer back to where purchased and exchanged for same model on 5/9. This time it was 2 1/2 hours ending with Hp person on phone. This time it was a printer carriage/printer ink setup problem, could not be fixed again. I took this one back to store and replaced with different brand entirely, setup was 1/2 hour tops. 96 wasted miles and 40 in gas. The saddest thing is this was to be a temporary printer for a month or two, I do bookkeeping and needed a printer right away and couldn't ... afford what I usually use now I might have to switch permanently. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This printer was to replace a Photosmart 209a that stopped functioning. I was careful to call HP directly because I needed a printer that will print an envelope that is 5 3/4 X 8 3/4, which is the size of an 8 1/2 X 11 in sheet of paper. I print at least 100 of these envelopes a year, for charity. I was told by the representative from HP (Felix) that this printer would do that. I received the printer, installed it, and could not program it for that size envelope. I called HP again, only to be told that this printer cannot print that size envelope. I returned the printer. I don't know why the salesmen are not informed. Maybe there is, indeed, a way to set it up that way, but no one there could help me do it.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This printer was very easy to hook up. The ease ended there. The paper frequently jams. I was unable to print envelopes due to "media error" which could not be fixed.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Efficient
Cons: At times it is squeaky
It works great for my use. The copies, prints and scans work well. I haven't used the fax yet. It is the squeaks once in a while that bother me

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: It is fast; Efficient; Excellent print quality; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
I wanted to be able to print from my PC, make copies, scan, and fax. This one does it all and does it to my complete satisfaction.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
I've never purchased an HP Product before.
There are a few features I use frequently that the Epson Inkjet printers have that the HP Officejet printer did not have for a cheaper price.
Epson Inkjet printers allow double-sided printing. Their scanner software allows multiple page scanning. Also it automatically names saved files incremently. i.e. SCAN001, SCAN002.
There are probably a few other features this product doesn't have that I've yet to discover.
I'm disappointed with this product and will be returning it to my place of purchase.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Printer has some great features like e-print, wireless connection, fax, scanner and small footprint. The one thing that I wish I would have known prior to buying this is the printer is pretty loud when printing. Overall its a pretty good buy, but if you are using it for a home based business, you may want to spend a little more time going to stores and testing different models.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Low Ink Consumption; Durable construction; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Reliable
Great product - I have had HP products in the past and this lives up to my past experience which has always been excellent.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Reliable; Compact Design; Low Ink Consumption
Cons: None
One of the best all in one printers I've owned

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Prints well when it stays on line
Item.Review:
Pros: Prints well and ink appears to be reasonable
Cons: It drops off my wireless network
I thought the printer was a good value at about $100, but it has been a challenge to keep it up and working wirelessly.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Lacks Double Sided Featur; Hard To Use; Unreliable; Jams Easily
The HP4620 was intended to be a replacement for the HP4500 but it is not as reliable as the latter. It jams frequently, drifts out of synch with the local WiFi and HP failed to add the important feature of double sided printing. It is not a printer I would recommend for anything but occasional use.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: scan wirelessly to computer has issues
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Scan Unreliable
There are no issues with printing or copying but the wireless scan to computers does not work when invoked from the printer and the hp printer assistant software. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the software and used hp's "fixit software" and tried disabling the anti-virus software and firewall. Still doesn't work. I noticed on the hp support forum that others are having the same problem. the hp support personnels suggestions are laughable. They have no clue.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Cons: Color Quality Pathetic; Too much ink used; Hate 4 Cartridge Setup; Noisy
Huge disappointment, and a massive step down from my previous printer which seems to have been discontinued!!!

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: ePrinting for iPad - separate ink cartridges
Cons: Disconnects from network sometimes
Easy to setup and works well for a cheap wireless all in one printer. Could be a little quicker and quiet, but that is not a big issue. Sometimes when jobs a sent to it the printer is not on-line but it comes back after pressing the blue network button (some small instabilitiy issue HP should prepare a patch for).

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Cons: Hard To Use; Unreliable; Hard Setup
I finally returned this terrible machine after seven hours of trying to get it to work with five techs and three countries. I will never buy HP aain

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I purchased the HP 4620 and it worked great for about 6 weeks . I have no power to it at all so now have to pack it up and return to the store. I have purchased other printers from Office depot without a problem...........I may look for a better wireless........I noticed it was made cheaper than my brother and canon purchased from Office Depot..

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: compact, quick and resolution is great
Cons: nothing
I needed a new all in one machine. This is a wonderful choice, it is compact, fast and the resolution is wonderful.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Paper Jam each time I tried to print - tried it for four hours, then spent another 90 minutes with your very patient super nice Technical Support Customer Rep. He tried everything with me and agreed my printer is defective. Will buy HP, but not the 4620

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

I needed a printer and I bought this on set it up and finished my printing.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I bought a 4620 all in one, It ate at least 12 pieces of paper. It took me three hours to get the right person to have it replaced. I got the new one which now works but I have been unable to set up the wireless. Having another new printer my computer was confused and so was I.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: I am completely satisfied with this all-in-one
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of installation and use.
Cons: It advertised a few features that aren't included on this model.
Installation was seamless, it is very user friendly, and the document feed works quite well, even on several pages (I used it with a 20 page document).

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Cons: Jams Easily; Ran out of ink very fast; Large Footprint; Won't print a third check
This was nice for the price, easy to set up but for me, I need to print checks and when you use one check it won't take the remaining two to print the next time. Very bad mistake as this means I have to handwrite them. Wish I could return for that reason.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; 1st one did not work; Easy exchange store
Cons: 1st one bad QC; Offshore tel help center; Can't understand agent
Staple mgr exchanged bad unit instantly. Very impressed that the process took 4 minutes.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Love the wireless features for my IPad and IPhone
Cons: Noisy
I love the wireless feature. I can now print from my IPad and IPhone where before I had to go to my desktop to print. Very slick. It was a little confusing to set up with HPrint, etc, etc, but finally got it somehow. Very noisy is that bothers you. Haven't done any photos yet. Have it in my bedroom and the on light is so bright it lit the room up at night and I have to cover it with a stick note.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Does everything that I would expect a printer to do
Great printer so far. Does everything that a printer should do with no problems so far. Would recommend.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: With all the choices.. I am glad I bought this. It is noisy like some of the reviews say, but it's the ink cartridges.... There are four- one black and three color. Installation was easy- just use the instructions and CD. It prints clearly and nice color. I would recommend if you need an everyday, home printer. Ink is reasonably priced to replace. I bought this because they have great customer service in my experience.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: It was an easy install and wireless setup. It works beautifully. I will eventually find out how the separate ink cartridges hold out. so far though I highly recommend this printer.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I have nothing but good things to say abiut the prienter and the support I got to set it up with the computer and iPhone and iPad. I phoned twice and both times the phone calls were appreciated. I got all my questions and issues answered very efficently.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Reliable; Quiet; Fast Operation
We are very pleased with our purchase and would recommend the HP Officejet #4620 to others.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast, clear, and very crisp printing. It scans quickly with great scan quality even at the lowest setting. Over-all sleek design. Multiple-feed scanning is a great feature.
Cons: Paper jams constantly, but it is easy to correct.
Very small paper tray, and the lower paper tray is tricky to load properly- it never feels like it's all the way in. Sometimes the paper drops onto the floor if the printing-catcher-tray-thingy is not pulled out all the way. (very technical terms, I know)
Always loses the Network connection to PC when it shuts down or if the PC is restarted. My co-workers and I are constantly reconnecting the Officejet 4620 to the Network even after just using it! Lately, the USB sometimes fails to connect automatically, as well.
It comes with a VE ... RY short USB cable that won't even reach to the back of my PC.
I like this machine, I work around it's quirks. We do not use it for faxing. Some of the settings are annoying to navigate, they should have bundled some of the categories together for quicker browsing. All in all it's a great printer if you can work around the connection issues and the constant paper jams. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Fast Operation; Flexibility; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use; Compact Design
I am very pleased with the printer and feel it is a good value for the money

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I assumed when purchasing the 4620 that it could easily do all the simple things in printing, including double-sided printing and grayscale printing, that my old 6210 printer could. This was an incorrect assumption. I spent a total of about 1 1/2 hours with HP tech support personnel on the telephone, during which time three tech reps told me the 4620 couldn't do these simple things by itself and that it couldn't use my 6210 software, which was still on my computer, to do them. But, while exploring the various capabilities of the new printer, I discovered that it can, indeed, use the 6210 software and print the way I had become accustomed to with my 6210. It works for me. Someone else buying this printer might not be as lucky as I. They might not already have compatible software already on ... their computer or otherwise available. It seems very strange to me that HP, already having developed and incorporated good printing software on my five-years-old 6210, would not incorporate it in the 4620. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: happy with tech help setting up on two computers
Item.Review: the tech help used remote control to install on desktop and laptop. had to directly download from HP the drivers and all necessary programs to the laptop. I later used the CD to put the same materials onto an older Dell running XP. All computers are using the 4620. I even added ePrint in case I need it.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Great Print Quality
As president of an organization, I run off lots of letters, posters/flyers and make copies of information sent to me from the state level. I chose HP because of the reliability I had with the one I have used for years that is now being used by my husband. I am looking forward to this new printer serving my multiple uses as well.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

I really like this wirless printer it was easy to set up for my desktop and my lapto

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

It is very awkward to load paper into the paper tray. If I were a heavy user, I would take it back due to these two items. Otherwise, it serves my purpose.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

I have a friend that is a computer tech and it took him an hour and a half to get it to talk to the computer after I spent hours-tech support is worthless-wont take 4x6 photo paper-jammed, and called to see where to open to get it out(since I couldnt find it in the book)and the guy said they would have to send someone out-I flipped-just answer the question-I hung up and eventually found it myself..HATE IT!!!

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

I searched to find this HP all-in-one with a streamlined profile, easy to set up and operate. I didn't mind spending a little more to get HP print quality and wireless fax; but was disappointed that it is so noisy when printing. I've had it a few weeks and hesitate to pack it up, return and re-select. I don't do a lot of printing, so providing it continues to function, I'll probably keep it. Noise level just not HP quality.

Item.Review:
Pros: Price, Print Speed for price, and Size
Cons: Loud
I needed a printer that was shorter than most but still had fax capability, this printer fit perfectly. I have found it faster than expected and it has a far better scanner than my last printer. It is loud but what can you expect from a hundred dollar printer.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: inexpensive
Cons: Unreliable; Drops wireless; Multiple problems; Flimsy Construction
I purchased this printer after happily using another HP all-in-one for many years. This one technically still "works" but I have so many problems with it that I am replacing it and not with an HP this time. Once burned, twice shy!
Difficulties I have experienced include: frequently dropped wi-fi connection, wi-fi connection stops working entirely and has to be reinstalled, frequent paper feed errors, distorted printing over wi-fi, inexplicably unreliable scanning in the middle of jobs, etc.
I really have nothing good to say about this printer. It's small. I guess that's a good thing.
As soon as my new printer arrives this one will be going to electronics recycling ... . Although it still technically "works" I would not wish it on anyone else. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I would like to have had a manual (hard copy) accompanythis printer. The manual might have explained the icons/buttons below the screen and to the left of the screen. I'm finding some features such as faxing and scanning dificult to figure out how to use. Loading paper into the tray at the bottom of the printer is awkward, especially when I try to place one or two sheets of paper on top of the sheets already in the paper tray. The paper can't be slid in all the way unless I first take the other paper partway out and place the addtional sheets on top. Copies of text and photos are clear and sharp.
